about_content:
I'm Elif Sena ErdoÄŸan. I studied Computer Engineering at Necmettin Erbakan University. During my university years, I became interested in web development through internships I completed. I started my software career by developing backends with Java Spring Boot, then shifted to the frontend side with React, gaining full-stack development experience.

After graduation, I started working as a Front-end Developer at 2C Bilgi Teknolojileri. In my first project, I worked as a full-stack developer to build a warehouse stock management system. I actively took part in corporate projects using React and Next.js, and assumed responsibilities not only in coding but also in analysis and design processes.

I care about code quality, maintainability, and user experience. Writing clean, simple, and readable code, and developing responsive interfaces are among my priorities. I pay attention to both technical and design details to create user-friendly, accessible, and high-performance applications.

I actively use Git and GitHub, developing my projects under version control. I also work with an open-source mindset, supporting team collaboration.

I'm familiar with UI component libraries (MUI, Ant Design, Tailwind CSS) and design tools (Figma). I value strong communication within the team and working harmoniously with UI/UX designers and backend developers. I'm a detail-oriented, solution-focused developer who is always open to learning.
